short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple reminder that makes you login before making a reservation.
short.ko: 에콜리안 예약 시 로그인을 먼저 하도록 유도합니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It redirects you to the login page when trying to make a reservation in ecolian.or.kr without signing in.
